focus: Clarity and patience lead to root.
fun: You break it, you own it.
Oops! Did I just root again?
logic: Analyze the pattern, break the logic.

start: Systems ready, tools loaded, mindset sharp.
found: Great find! Now escalate your advantage.
critical: Critical hit! Document carefully and escalate responsibly.
dominated: You've completely owned it. Time to document your path clearly.
blocked: Blocked by firewall or AV? Time to rethink and pivot.
pivot: Great pivot! Lateral movement unlocks new possibilities.
detect: Detection! Stay calm, adapt quickly, and reassess.
report: Report clearly and precisely—your findings matter.
firstaccess: First foothold achieved—expand your control methodically.
silent: Silent mode engaged. Deep focus activated.
timeout: Time's short—focus on high-value targets and document quickly.

exhausted: Rest if you must, but don't quit.
